EASTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
FLARE SIGHTED IN 26-26S 001-48W AT 051950Z JAN.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC CAPE TOWN,
PHONE: 272 1938 3300, E-MAIL: MARITIMERADIO@IXMAIL.CO.ZA
OR CAPE TOWN RADIO, PHONE: 272 1551 2617,
MRCC.CT@SAMSA.ORG.ZA.
